section1.organisationType: [W]What type of organisation is the respondent?
section1.contactName: [W]Name of preferred contact at the respondent’s address (optional)
section1.contactFormat: [W]How would you prefer to be contacted? (optional)
section1.reasonForPost: [W]Provide a reason why you have selected post
section1.contactLanguage: [W]What language would you like to be contacted in? (optional)

section2.participateInHearings: [W]Would you be able to take part in hearings by video and phone? (optional)
section2.explainReason: [W]Explain why you are unable to take part in video or phone hearings
section2.disabilitySupport: [W]Do you have a physical, mental or learning disability or health condition that means you need support during your case? (optional)
section2.supportRequest: [W]Tell us what support you need to request
section2.employeesInGreatBritain: [W]How many people does the respondent employ in Great Britain? (optional)
section2.multipleSites: [W]Does the respondent have more than one site in Great Britain? (optional)
section2.employeesAtSite: [W]How many employed at the site the claimant worked at? (optional)

section3.et3ResponseAcasAgree: [W]Do you agree with the details given by the claimant about early conciliation with Acas?
section3.et3ResponseAcasAgreeReason: [W]Why do you disagree with the Acas conciliation details given? (optional)
section3.et3ResponseAreDatesCorrect: [W]Are the dates of employment given by the claimant correct?
section3.et3ResponseEmploymentInformation: [W]Do you want to provide any further information about the claimant's employment dates? (optional)
section3.et3ResponseContinuingEmployment: [W]Is the claimant’s employment with the respondent continuing?
section3.et3ResponseCorrectJobTitle: [W]What is or was the claimant’s correct job title? (optional)
section3.et3ResponseClaimantWeeklyHours: [W]Are the claimant’s average weekly work hours correct?
section3.et3ResponseClaimantCorrectHours: [W]What are the claimant’s correct average weekly work hours? (optional)

section4.payDetailsCorrect: [W]Are the pay details given by the claimant correct?
section4.noticePeriodDetailsCorrect: [W]Are the claimant’s notice period details correct?
section4.noticePeriodDetails: [W]What are the claimant’s correct notice details? (optional)
section4.pensionAndBenefitsDetailsCorrect: [W]Are the claimants pension and benefits details correct?
section4.correctPensionAndBenefitsDetails: [W]What are the claimant’s correct pension and benefits details? (optional)

section6.respondentWantToMakeECC: [W]Does the respondent wish to make an Employer’s Contract Claim?
section6.employerContractClaimDetails: [W]Provide the background and details of your Employer’s Contract Claim
